title: Drawing, "Poster for "Everybody's Acting"", 1924
signed: Signed in green gouache, right: BATISTE / MADALENA; in graphite: 1924
inscribed: Inscribed in light blue-gray gouache, upper left: A FASCINATING / GLIMPSE BEHIND / THE FOOTLIGHTS; in white gouache, lower right: BETTY / BRONSON / IN; in white gouache, lower margin: "EVERYBODY'S / ACTING" / [in green gouache] WITH/ [in blue gouache] LOUISE DRESSER & FORD STERLING
creditline: Gift of Judith and Steven Katten
description: The poster depicts a young woman, wearing a red dress and black Mary Janes, shown from behind. Lower left, a small silhouette of a dancer; lower right, a small figure playing the guitar.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Poster for "Everybody's Acting"", 1924.
1924. Brush and gouache on cardboard. Gift of Judith and Steven Katten. 1986-118-6.
